org.apache.oodt.commons

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.commons.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    EDA Configuration. An object of this class represents the configuration information for the EDA software.
    Author:
    Kelly

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        public static Configuration getConfiguration()
                                      throws IOException,
                                             SAXException
        Get the singleton configuration. This method returns the singleton configuration object, or creates it if it doesn't yet exist. To create it, it reads the configuration file specified by the system property org.apache.oodt.commons.Configuration.url or the file in the user's home directory called .edarc.xml if the system property isn't specified. It parses the file and returns a Configuration object initialized with the data specified therein.
        Returns:
        An initialized configuration object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If reading the configuration file fails.
        SAXException - If parsing the configuration file fails.
        MalformedURLException - If the URL specification is invalid.

      • getConfiguration

        public static Configuration getConfiguration(URL configFileUrl)
                                      throws SAXException,
                                             IOException
        Get the singleton configuration. This method returns the singleton configuration object from a specified file url. It parses the file and returns a Configuration object initialized with the data specified therein. Added by Chris Mattmann 12/05/03.
        Returns:
        An initialized configuration object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        SAXException

      • getConfigurationWithoutException

        public static Configuration getConfigurationWithoutException()
        Get the singleton configuration without exception. This method is identical to getConfiguration() but traps all checked exceptions. If the configuration can't be read, it returns null.
        Returns:
        An initialized configuration object, or null if an error occurred.

      • toXML

        public String toXML()
             throws DOMException
        Serialize this configuration into a serialized XML document.
        Returns:
        Serialized XML version of this configuration.
        Throws:
        DOMException - If an error occurs constructing the XML structure.

      • toXML

        public Node toXML(Document document)
           throws DOMException
        Parameters:
        document - The document to which the XML structure will belong.
        Returns:
        The root node representing this configuration.
        Throws:
        DOMException - If an error occurs constructing the XML structure.

      • mergeProperties

        public void mergeProperties(Properties targetProps)
        Merge the properties in the configuration into the given properties. Properties that already exist in the targetProps won't be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        targetProps - The target properties.

      • getExecServerConfigs

        public Collection getExecServerConfigs()
        Get the exec-server configurations.
        Returns:
        A collection of exec server configurations, each of class ExecServerConfig.

      • getExecServerConfigs

        public Collection getExecServerConfigs(Class clazz)
        Get the exec-server configurations.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of exec servers that will be returned.
        Returns:
        A collection of exec server configurations, each of class ExecServerConfig.

      • getExecServerConfig

        public ExecServerConfig getExecServerConfig(String objectKey)
        Get an exec-server configuration.
        Parameters:
        objectKey - The object key of the Exec Server to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An ExecServerConfig or null if object key not found.

      • getNameServerStateFrequency

        public int getNameServerStateFrequency()
        Get the frequency with which the name server saves its state.
        Returns:
        The state-save frequency in milliseconds; <= 0 means never save state.

      • getObjectContext

        public Context getObjectContext()
                         throws NamingException
        Get the object context.
        Returns:
        The object context based on this configuration.
        Throws:
        NamingException - If the context can't be created.

      • getEntityRefDirs

        public List getEntityRefDirs()
        Get the entity reference directories.
        Returns:
        A list of Strings naming directories for entity references.

      • getServerMgrPort

        public int getServerMgrPort()
        Get the port number on which the server manager is listening.
        Returns:
        The port number, or 0 if there is no server manager.
